info.name: YouTube Custom Background Style
info.description:
!!! TURN ON DARK MODE ON YOUTUBE !!!

I used "Fade+ for Youtube" by "macsy" as an template. If you mind just give your feedback below and i will made everything by myself. Im just too lazy.
info.additionalInfo:
Update 12 09.05.2020
-fixed problem with colored tumbs on video, they are no longer white
-subscribe button is red as previous, but subscribed button is now grey
-minor fixes

Update 11 09.05.2020
-fixed white header problem at youtube studio(again)
-various changes with font color at youtube studio
-minor fixes

Update 10 09.05.2020
-view reply, verified user name, date on comments, channel name on "Up Next" card, youtube channel name, username of person who uploaded the video at comments section changed to blueish color
-subscriptions counter is now red
-changed color on thumbs up and down in comments section (up=green, down=red)
-cancel button at typing comment now isn't outstanding from style
-minor changes and fixes

Update 9 07.05.2020
-changed color on live icon near youtube name, from white to red
-redesigned search bar
-redesigned search box

Update 8 05.05.2020
-fixed video lenght bar

Update 7 03.05.2020
-fixed white analytics tabs

Update 6 28.04.2020
-bug with #header is gone, no more random grey backgrounds.
-in youtube studio at videos tab header was white, not anymore (probably relative to bug mentioned before)
-moved search bar in history tab, before it was under main header
-progress bar on videos/streams is now relative to videos/streams length, earlier there was some space left at the end

Update 5 26.04.2020
-red border on edit video button is gone now
-fixed problem with #header background color, now library button doesn't outstand from the rest of buttons, sam with buttons under banner
-confirm button isnt white now
-added hovers on left panel
-minor changes that i dont remember

Update 4 23.04.2020
-Channel comments and Channel subtitles support
-Settings support
-sort of support for channel monetization, im not monetized by youtube :pepesad:
-also sort of support for audio library, i cant edit those blank buttons, not sure why
-minor fixes in channel videos tab

Update 3 18.04.2020
-Channel analytics support
-minor fixes in upload video tab

Update 2 14.04.2020
-honestly i dont remember what i'd changed, but what i know is that there is full channel videos support now. so now you can edit your videos with nice theme in background, nice.
-minor changes
man my english sucks

Update 1 13.04.2020
-added color to thumbs up and down
-started doing youtube studio, for now theres only channel dashboard
-upload video container fully changed
-little redesign of code (background images are on top now, no need to scroll all the way down as previously)
-minor fixes


INFO:
About that bug with scrollbar appearing in fullscreen mode, it's isn't style fault, its youtube fault. I can't do anything, sorry. It will stay disabled until they'll fix it, which is unlikely to happen.

Known bugs:
-need to scroll for live chat to appear

Future Plans: 
-polish everything
